home.briefSummary: Helping companies and project fullfill their thecnological goals by building amazing products. Teaching about web development, serverless, and React / Next.js.

lastJob.title: Team Leader & Full Stack Software Developer

about.longThirdPerson: Simon Mor is the development team leader at {lastJob} where he helps the product and the team build a better web app and leads the Next.js app forward.  He is an open-source contributor. An educator, writer, and speaker, Simon has created courses on React, Next.js, and web development.
about.longFirstPerson: Hey, I'm Simon. I'm the development team leader at {lastJob} where I'm helping the product and the team build a better web app and leads the Next.js app forward. I'm passionate about software developemnt frontend AND backend. an open-source contributor. An educator, writer, and speaker, I have created courses on React, Next.js, and web development.
about.shortFirstPerson: Simon Mor is a software developer and team leader at {lastJob} Lead the Next.js app forward.
about.shortThirdPerson: Hey, I'm Simon. I'm a software developer and team leader at {lastJob} Leading the Next.js app forward.

learn.title: Learn React & Next.js
learn.description: Build and deploy a modern SaaS application using the most popular open-source software. This course is 12 hours long and is completely live streamed.
